response: Hi! How can I help you today?
Main VEDA AI hoon, aapka personal assistant.
I can control your system, open apps, check weather, and answer questions.
Main system control, apps open/close, weather check, aur bahut kuch kar sakti hoon.
Why did the AI go to school? To improve its learning algorithms!
AI school kyun gaya? Apne algorithms improve karne ke liye!
I'm doing great! All systems operational. How can I assist you?
Main bilkul theek hoon! Sab systems ready hain. Kya madad chahiye?
You're welcome! Always happy to help.
Aapka swagat hai! Madad karna mera kaam hai.
